member.name: M:MVC3Exploration.AuthorizeAttributeWithConfiguredRedirect.HandleUnauthorizedRequest(System.Web.Mvc.AuthorizationContext)
member.summary:
Implementation of the management in case of unauthorized access to a controller/action.
Perform a redirection to the url specified into the attribute property named "nonAllowedRedirectUrl"

member.name: T:MVC3Exploration.AuthorizeAttributeWithConfiguredRedirect
member.summary: Custom implementation of a "Authorize" attribute that offer possbility to configure target redirection in case of non allowed access.

member.name: M:MVC3Exploration.MVC3Exploration.SampleFilterController.HelloSecured
member.summary:
Sample action that, when is reached, show behavior of differents life cyle filter.
This action require that user will be authenticated and possess role "ADMIN"

member.name: M:MVC3Exploration.MVC3Exploration.SampleFilterController.HelloNotSecured
member.summary: Sample action that, when is reached, show behavior of differents life cyle filter.

member.name: M:MVC3Exploration.MVC3Exploration.SampleFilterController.HelloWithError
member.summary: Sample action that, when is reached, throw a NullReferenceException that invoke "HandleError" attribute processing

member.name: M:MVC3Exploration.MVC3Exploration.SampleFilterController.HelloSecuredCustomAttr
member.summary:
Sample action that, when is reached, show behavior of differents life cyle filter.
This action require that user will be authenticated and possess role "ADMIN" and use a custom "Authorize" attribute implementation

member.name: T:MVC3Exploration.MVC3Exploration.SampleFilterController
member.summary:
Controller exploring behavior of differents MVC3 filters
Test urls : http://localhost:62943/SampleFilter/HelloSecured?login=righettod http://localhost:62943/SampleFilter/HelloNotSecured http://localhost:62943/SampleFilter/HelloWithError http://localhost:62943/SampleFilter/HelloSecuredCustomAttr?login=righettod
